errors.server_comms: The Console encountered a problem communicating with the server. Please try again.
errors.needs-registration: In order to use the [[@:product.console]] you must connect to a registered service endpoint. Registered service endpoints are provided by your system administrator. Please contact your administrator about registering endpoints.
errors.upgrade-wait: Please wait for the upgrade to complete and then refresh or contact your administrator for further information.
errors.generic-async-failure: There was a problem carrying out the action. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the administrator.
